member.name: T:Willow.CommandAndControl.Application.Services.Abstractions.IConflictDetector
member.summary: Provides conditions for identifying conflicts in commands.

member.name: M:Willow.CommandAndControl.Application.Services.Abstractions.IConflictDetector.AreContained(Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand,Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand)
member.summary: Returns True when one command is fully contained in another command.
member.returns: true if one command is inside the other, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Willow.CommandAndControl.Application.Services.Abstractions.IConflictDetector.HaveSameInterval(Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand,Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand)
member.summary: Returns True when both commands have Start/End time .
member.returns: true if the commands have the same interval, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Willow.CommandAndControl.Application.Services.Abstractions.IConflictDetector.HaveSameIntervalAndValue(Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand,Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand)
member.summary: Returns True when both commands have same Start/End time and same Value.
member.returns: true if the commands have the same interval and value, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Willow.CommandAndControl.Application.Services.Abstractions.IConflictDetector.IsOverlapping(Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand,Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand)
member.summary: Returns True when new command is overlapping existing command.
member.returns: true if the commands overlap, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Willow.CommandAndControl.Application.Services.Abstractions.IConflictDetector.AreConflicting(Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand,Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand)
member.summary: Returns True when new command has overlapping interval with existing one, and values less than or greater than existing command depending on the type of command.
member.returns: true if the commands conflict, otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value for the command.
member.remarks: This may be the value that is set depending on the conflict resolution strategy.

member.name: P:Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand.Unit
member.summary: Gets or sets the unit of the value.

member.name: P:Willow.CommandAndControl.Data.Models.RequestedCommand.StartTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the the time from which the value should be applied. This may correspond to an actual start time for an executed command but it might not if conflict resolution decides otherwise.

member.summary: Gets or sets the the time until other values cannot be applied. The actual end time depends on the conflict resolution strategy.
